children.html: L(u,λ):=f(u)−∑j=1mλjφj(u).\mathcal L(u,\lambda):=f(u)-\sum_{j=1}^m\lambda_j\varphi_j(u).L(u,λ):=f(u)−j=1∑m​λj​φj​(u).

children.value: No admissible descent directions at a constrained minimum.
This gives gradient balance with active constraint normals.
That balance is KKT with nonnegative multipliers.
Second order checks Lagrangian curvature on critical directions.
